channel.title: How do i add the special attack?
channel.description:
hey, i have the code for dragon claws which is 8002, and they dont have a special attack. i was wondering if someone could tell me how i add it...
Thanks

item.title: How do i add the special attack?
item.dc:creator: @Zezerex Zezerex
item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

[quote=“client class, post:17, topic:286241”][quote author=Zezerex link=topic=378578.msg2847477#msg2847477 date=1246364133]

[quote author=Owner Nader link=topic=378578.msg2847475#msg2847475 date=1246364044]
Its wrong, You need special.java to add spec,
[/quote]oh, then the tutorial is wrong, do you want my special.java?
[/quote]what is that code and where do i add it?

The tutorial is not wrong. Simply, Delta sources suck ass.

But anyways, go to client.java and add a code that makes it hit 4 times.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add the special attack?
item.dc:creator: @Zezerex Zezerex
item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

[quote=“Owner Nader, post:8, topic:286241”]Which Source u using?[/quote]I am using menno’s source/woeshie source

i have this code that i made, im not sure where i would put it

public void DClawsSpecial() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) {
setAnimation(2068);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(20);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(20);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(20);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(2068);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }
}

Read full topic
